name: Lashes Lifting Silicone Shields Small 10pcs
short_description: The small shields are perfect for clients with short natural lashes and for those seeking a dramatic and a more intense lash lifting.
long_description: Phi silicone shields come in three sizes in Small, Medium or Large, providing the clients a multiple option of potential looks that could be created, considering the length of their natural lashes and their preference and expectations of the final look from the lifting procedure. The smaller the shield used the greater and more dramatic the lift is to be achieved. The shields come in white color, providing your work precision even to the smallest details.
